docs.text: Service Service .postUserAuthV2(username, password) .postAuthOtp(otp) .getBalanceV2Ngrs() .getBalanceV2Linkaja() .getTransactionsHistory(startDate, endDate, page) .getProductV3(categoryCode, msisdn, paymentMethod) .postPackageActivationV5(msisdn, packageId, paymentMethod, price, trxType) .postPackageActivationConfirmV2(token, pin) .getTransactionsDetail(id, trxType) .getRechargeDenom(msisdn, paymentMethod, categoryCode) .postRechargeV2(denomRecharge, price, rechargeType, msisdn, paymentMethod) .postRechargeConfirm(token, pin) .postVoucherFisikV2(serialNumber, pin, productId, price, paymentMethod) Service.postUserAuthV2(username, password) Param Type Description username String required password String required Example http://localhost:3000/components/digiposaja/postUserAuthV2?_id=digiposaja-RID3147852&username=RID3147852&password=147852 Service.postAuthOtp(otp) Param Type Description otp String required Example http://localhost:3000/components/digiposaja/postAuthOtp?_id=digiposaja-RID3147852&otp=212544 Service.getBalanceV2Ngrs() Example http://localhost:3000/components/digiposaja/getBalanceV2Ngrs?_id=digiposaja-RID3147852 Service.getBalanceV2Linkaja() Example http://localhost:3000/components/digiposaja/getBalanceV2Linkaja?_id=digiposaja-RID3147852 Service.getTransactionsHistory(startDate, endDate, page) Param Type Default Description startDate String YYYYMMDD optional endDate String YYYYMMDD optional page String 0 optional Example http://localhost:3000/components/digiposaja/getTransactionsHistory?_id=digiposaja-RID3147852 http://localhost:3000/components/digiposaja/getTransactionsHistory?_id=digiposaja-RID3147852&startDate=20201101&endDate=20201105&page=0 Service.getProductV3(categoryCode, msisdn, paymentMethod) Param Type Default Description categoryCode String required DATA , VOICE_SMS , DIGITAL , ROAMING , VF , NSB , NSP , HVC msisdn String required paymentMethod String LINKAJA required LINKAJA , NGRS Example http://localhost:3000/components/digiposaja/getProductV3?_id=digiposaja-RID3147852&categoryCode=DATA&msisdn=085220878457 http://localhost:3000/components/digiposaja/getProductV3?_id=digiposaja-RID3147852&categoryCode=DATA&msisdn=085220878457&paymentMethod=LINKAJA Service.postPackageActivationV5(msisdn, packageId, paymentMethod, price, trxType) Param Type Default Description msisdn String required packageId String required paymentMethod String LINKAJA required LINKAJA , NGRS price String required trxType String required Example http://localhost:3000/components/digiposaja/postPackageActivationV5?_id=digiposaja-RID3147852&msisdn=085220878457&packageId=00017507&price=2500&trxType=Data http://localhost:3000/components/digiposaja/postPackageActivationV5?_id=digiposaja-RID3147852&msisdn=085220878457&packageId=00017507&paymentMethod=LINKAJA&price=2500&trxType=Data Service.postPackageActivationConfirmV2(token, pin) Param Type Description token String required pin String required Example http://localhost:3000/components/digiposaja/postPackageActivationConfirmV2?_id=digiposaja-RID3147852&token=TOKEN&pin=142536 Service.getTransactionsDetail(id, trxType) Param Type Description id String required trxType String required Example http://localhost:3000/components/digiposaja/getTransactionsDetail?_id=digiposaja-RID3147852&id=462750993&trxType=DATA Service.getRechargeDenom(msisdn, paymentMethod, categoryCode) Param Type Default Description msisdn String required paymentMethod String LINKAJA required LINKAJA , NGRS categoryCode String optional Example http://localhost:3000/components/digiposaja/getRechargeDenom?_id=digiposaja-RID3147852&msisdn=085220878457 http://localhost:3000/components/digiposaja/getRechargeDenom?_id=digiposaja-RID3147852&msisdn=085220878457&paymentMethod=LINKAJA Service.postRechargeV2(denomRecharge, price, rechargeType, msisdn, paymentMethod) Param Type Default Description denomRecharge String required price String required rechargeType String BULK required msisdn String required paymentMethod String LINKAJA required Example http://localhost:3000/components/digiposaja/postRechargeV2?_id=digiposaja-RID3147852&denomRecharge=1000&price=1400&msisdn=085220878457 http://localhost:3000/components/digiposaja/postRechargeV2?_id=digiposaja-RID3147852&denomRecharge=1000&price=1400&rechargeType=BULK&msisdn=085220878457&paymentMethod=LINKAJA Service.postRechargeConfirm(token, pin) Param Type Description token String required pin String required Example http://localhost:3000/components/digiposaja/postRechargeConfirm?_id=digiposaja-RID3147852&token=43f0bac17a5046382cfa1d488e032ab96325bbce44f025090b14d4eeb2de21e1c259c5c50ac6cca59b4aed9dfec8aa770a422f2c7d268d48fe74379f82167f4a&pin=142536 Service.postVoucherFisikV2(serialNumber, pin, productId, price, paymentMethod) Param Type Default Description serialNumber String required pin String required productId String required price String required paymentMethod String LINKAJA required Example http://localhost:3000/components/digiposaja/postVoucherFisikV2?_id=digiposaja-RID3147852&serialNumber=085220878457&pin=142536&productId=00022541&price=8500 http://localhost:3000/components/digiposaja/postVoucherFisikV2?_id=digiposaja-RID3147852&serialNumber=085220878457&pin=142536&productId=00022541&price=8500&paymentMethod=LINKAJA

docs.text: Service Service .postLoginOtpRequest(username, qrCode) .postOauthToken(password) .getTransactionGet() .getProductGetProduct(path) .postProductActivationProductFrc(msisdn, pin, productCode, productPrice, code, price) .postProductActivationProductSpv(pin, spvType, productCode, productPrice, qrVoucher, price, voucher) .getCrpGetRecommendation(path) .postProductActivationProductRecharges(groupFeature, msisdn, pin, productCode, productPrice) .postLigaSuperCheckKPK(subscriberMsisdn) .postLigaSuperCheckSPV(voucherQrCode) Service.postLoginOtpRequest(username, qrCode) Param Type Description username String required qrCode String required Example http://localhost:3000/components/rita/postLoginOtpRequest?_id=rita-089607014785&username=089607014785&qrCode=00098745 Service.postOauthToken(password) Param Type Description password String required Example http://localhost:3000/components/rita/postOauthToken?_id=rita-089607014785&password=123456 Service.getTransactionGet() Example http://localhost:3000/components/rita/getTransactionGet?_id=rita-089607014785 Service.getProductGetProduct(path) Param Type Description path String 0 : FRC , 2 : ADDON , 1 : SPV_BLANK , 5 : SPV0 , 3 : RITA_PACKAGE , RITA_TOPUP , VAS_PRODUCTS Example http://localhost:3000/components/rita/getProductGetProduct?_id=rita-089607014785&path=0 Service.postProductActivationProductFrc(msisdn, pin, productCode, productPrice, code, price) Param Type Description msisdn String required pin String required productCode String required productPrice String required code String optional addon price String optional addon Example # no addon http://localhost:3000/components/rita/postProductActivationProductFrc?_id=rita-089607014785&msisdn=08969680772&pin=1717&productCode=JANET&productPrice=8000 # addon http://localhost:3000/components/rita/postProductActivationProductFrc?_id=rita-089607014785&msisdn=08969680772&pin=1717&productCode=JANET&productPrice=8000&code=YT5&price=2500 Service.postProductActivationProductSpv(pin, spvType, productCode, productPrice, qrVoucher, price, voucher) Param Type Description pin String required spvType String required productCode String required SPVBLANK productPrice String required SPVBLANK qrVoucher String required SPVBLANK price String required SPV0 voucher String required SPV0 Example # SPVBLANK http://localhost:3000/components/rita/postProductActivationProductSpv?_id=rita-089607014785&pin=1717&spvType=SPVBLANK&productCode=VMINI1&productPrice=8500&qrVoucher=307319750300 # SPV0 http://localhost:3000/components/rita/postProductActivationProductSpv?_id=rita-089607014785&pin=1717&spvType=SPV0&price=0&voucher=307319750300 Service.getCrpGetRecommendation(path) Param Type Description path String required Example http://localhost:3000/components/rita/getCrpGetRecommendation?_id=rita-089607014785&path=089696802772 Service.postProductActivationProductRecharges(groupFeature, msisdn, pin, productCode, productPrice) Param Type Description groupFeature String required RITATOPUP , RITAPACKAGE , VASPRODUCTS msisdn String required pin String required productCode String required productPrice String required Example # RITATOPUP http://localhost:3000/components/rita/postProductActivationProductRecharges?_id=rita-089607014785&groupFeature=RITATOPUP&msisdn=089696802772&pin=1717&productCode=T1&productPrice=1179 # RITAPACKAGE http://localhost:3000/components/rita/postProductActivationProductRecharges?_id=rita-089607014785&groupFeature=RITAPACKAGE&msisdn=089696802772&pin=1717&productCode=RL300&productPrice=4500 # VASPRODUCTS http://localhost:3000/components/rita/postProductActivationProductRecharges?_id=rita-089607014785&groupFeature=VASPRODUCTS&msisdn=089696802772&pin=1717&productCode=GRN165&productPrice=50000 Service.postLigaSuperCheckKPK(subscriberMsisdn) Param Type Description subscriberMsisdn String required Example http://localhost:3000/components/rita/postLigaSuperCheckKPK?_id=rita-089607014785&subscriberMsisdn=089696802772 Service.postLigaSuperCheckSPV(voucherQrCode) Param Type Description voucherQrCode String required Example http://localhost:3000/components/rita/postLigaSuperCheckSPV?_id=rita-089607014785&voucherQrCode=307319750300
docs.title: rita
